name: Custom Posts Builder
author: Prince Singh

sections.description:
Features

* fully ajaxified & Beautiful UI * Featherlight : Gets done almost everything without loading page * Create unlimited posts & taxonomies * Import & export posts and taxonomies * Tons of customisability options * Feature to add dedicated taxonomy to a post type * dedicated support  Take custom posts wherever you go.  * Option to import & export custom posts & taxonomies

Features: Pro

* Add custom admin columns - pro only feature * Drag & drop admin column reorder * User defined custom filters * powerful shortcodes.    Watch it in action    Follow this plugin on [GitHub](https://github.com/wpdevstudio/custom-posts-builder)    Create unlimited admin columns & show the details you need.      * Disable / enable the default admin columns for your custom post type, only show details you need     * Add unlimited admin columns, show more information at glance !     * Pre built most desired columns like featured image     * Drag & drop reorder columns based on the priority     * Temporary disable / delete the custom columns with a click     * Total command on what you need to show in custom fields with powerful built-in shortcodes     * Meta data, taxonomy data or even a function result, everthing can be shown just using shortcode. no need to touch code !  Create custom filters for admin columns.      * Add filters using ajax enabled autocomplete field     * Auto filters for every taxonomy created     * Search using filters to refine your view
sections.installation: 1. Upload plugin zip contents to wp-contents/plugin directory and activate the plugin

short_description: Best custom posts & taxonomy manager plugin for wordpress
